Text: Hi, my friend! How are you? I saw that your m4rtyr he has quit to post his 60fps versions. If you want, we can share what it's left. I'm not selfish. Cheers, bro!

I'm happy for you, bro. I hope it will be better at your new job. I don't have one. We'll miss you, buddy. But if that will change and you'll comeback, please, let me know, and we'll share the ups. Or for anything else... I hope to talk from time to time. Cheers and take care, my friend! God bless you!
